::Zardus/Reptilica/Bloodystrike/Havoc/Repressor::

Zardus tries to dodge, one of the shots hitting him in the chest and leaving 
a large dent. He growls. He was not going to let another shot like that hit 
him.

Zardus looks down at Grenade, Zardus fires two dozen more shots.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
This time, Reptilica was ready. He dives and spins, easily avoiding all the 
shots. He had figured out this bot's strategy: just fire till the enemy's 
dead.

Reptilica smiles, firing two missiles at Jetstorm and then a rapid succession 
of rifle shots, spread out so they would be very hard to dodge, but careful 
not to hit the missiles.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Havoc laughs as he sees Beholder fall, another bomb emerging out of the 
WarMachine and flying at Beholder.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
A missile explodes against the bottom of Repressor, sending him spiralling 
before he recovers.

He turns in the air, his weapons getting a lock on Gigas and Horn Drill again.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Bloodystrike jumps backwards, severe scratches on his chest from Sharpedge's 
weapon.

His thrusters activate, sending him flying up and firing multiple shots at 
Sharpedge's neck and head.
